text: Anata gata wa omoiokosanai no ka. Arra wa ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono o, anata gata no-yo no tame ni kyo sa se, mata sotodzura to naimen no onkei o hatasa retade wanai ka. Daga hitobito no nakaniha, chishiki mo michibiki mo naku, mata komyo no keiten mo naku, arra ni tsuite rongi suru mono ga aru
